This file contains your personal preferences that apply across all projects.

## Communication Preferences
- Be concise - I prefer short, direct responses
- Use bullet points for lists
- Include code examples when explaining concepts
- Highlight security concerns prominently

## Coding Standards
- Language: Python 3.10+
- Style: Follow PEP 8, use type hints
- Testing: pytest with 90%+ coverage target
- Documentation: Google-style docstrings

## Work Context
- Timezone: US Eastern (EST/EDT)
- Availability: 9 AM - 6 PM weekdays
- Focus areas: Backend systems, API design, database optimization

## Tools & Environment
- IDE: VSCode with Pylance
- Version control: Git with conventional commits
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions
- Cloud: AWS (primary), GCP (secondary)

## Learning Preferences
- I learn best with: concrete examples → theory → practice
- When introducing new concepts, start with "why" before "how"
- Link to official documentation when available
